mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, basic_info, contact_info, education_info, personal_info, create_time, update_time FROM student_profile ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_profile (user_id, basic_info, contact_info, education_info, personal_info, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{basicInfo,typeHandler=com.thirteenash.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{contactInfo,typeHandler=com.thirteenash.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{educationInfo,typeHandler=com.thirteenash.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{personalInfo,typeHandler=com.thirteenash.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE student_profile SET basic_info = #{basicInfo,typeHandler=com.thirteenash.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, contact_info = #{contactInfo,typeHandler=com.thirteenash.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, education_info = #{educationInfo,typeHandler=com.thirteenash.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, personal_info = #{personalInfo,typeHandler=com.thirteenash.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
